definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to let saliva dribble from the mouth/to slobber

sentences.english: Killing the slaver overseer no longer results in karma loss.
sentences.chinese: 殺死口水監督員在業虧損不再結果。

sentences.english: Then, rinses the saliva including the approximately 10 milliliters , rinses 1 minute with the above method.
sentences.chinese: 然後，含約10毫升的漱口水，用上述方法漱1分鐘。

sentences.english: He had become very still. Saliva was at the corners of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸已經一動不動了，嘴角上還淌着口水。

sentences.english: The political impact of what Bush and I were doing was uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 老布什和我在當時的口水仗有何政治影響，還不好說。

sentences.english: The baby drooled at the corners of his mouth.
But in the end, Yang's laughs will surely drown out those of his keyboard warrior critics.
sentences.chinese: 但是在最後，孫楊的笑容勢必會蓋過鍵盤俠們的口水。

sentences.english: Ice cream always makes his mouth  water.
sentences.chinese: 冰淇淋總能讓他饞得淌口水。

sentences.english: Others think the prime minister is pushing him forward to take the opprobrium.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人則認爲，總理正在把他推到前臺承受口水。

sentences.english: Of course, there are actually those who enjoy a slobbery show of affection from their dog.
sentences.chinese: 當然，確實有人很享受狗狗的這種流着口水的愛。

sentences.english: Can we go and have a drink after that?
sentences.chinese: 幹完這事後我們可以去喝口水嗎？

sentences.english: Oh, dad, your stew makes my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 噢，爸，你燉得菜香得讓我流口水了。

sentences.english: I am able to swim after I gulped down many mouthfuls of water.
sentences.chinese: 在我吞下很多口水以後我才學會游泳。

sentences.english: Cang Li Man's drooling all over the keyboard when looking at the picture.
sentences.chinese: 倉裏滿看着那張圖片，口水噠噠滴，全流在鍵盤上。

sentences.english: I don’t want to feel depleted.
sentences.chinese: 我不想有口水被耗乾的感覺。

sentences.english: My mouth is watering looking at the sliced cold chicken with twovanillas.
sentences.chinese: 白嫩嫩的白斬雞，點綴上兩棵香菜，看着就流口水。

definition: mouth/CL:張|张[zhang1]/slap in the face/CL:個|个[ge4]
readily/flatly (deny, admit and so on)/a mouthful/a bite
big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
to let saliva dribble from the mouth/to slobber
a full mouth of (sth physical)/to have the mouth exclusively filled with (a certain language, lies, promises, etc)
